snippet.title: Allied General - First Campaign Scenario
snippet.description:
A quick gameplay video of Allied General, the sequel to Panzer General.

Published by Mindscape, Inc., Strategic Simulations, Inc.
Developed by Halestorm, Inc., Strategic Simulations, Inc.
Released 1995

Recorded with HyperCam 2. OS: Windows XP SP2.

Sound sync was beyond repair so enjoy music from Panzer General III: Scorched Earth in the background for the duration of the battle.
